tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I am consulting Dr Rituparna Saha for a long time now and every time, I am very much satisfied by her treatment. My last visit was for wisdom tooth extraction and oral rehabilitation. I thought it might be a little painful but to my surprise, I did not feel a any discomfort during the entire procedure and everything was so well done. 
The cleanliness and hygiene of the clinic is always praiseworthy.
I have visited several doctors earlier, but she is the best I have come across and I would recommend her to everyone. 
Thanks to Dr Rituparna Saha and I wish her all the best.
reply_text: Thank you so much Sir for your valued appriciation & feedback... and trusting Us with ur Smile.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Saha is a very professional, capable and understanding dentist. It was my first ever visit to any dentist and that too for RCT, she very patiently made me understand the problem, the line of treatment and any possible discomfort that I can expect. She is also very transparent about the cost of the procedure and explains all available options. I am now in a much better state thanks to her.. The clinic is very hygienic and Dr Saha and her assistant undertake every required measure like, PPE kits, temperature checks, oxygen saturation test and sanitisation of the clinic equipment to ensure itâ€™s safe for everyone during these times. I would highly recommend Dr Saha to anyone looking for a good dental treatment!
reply_text: Thank you so much Sir, for your valued review. We appreciate your trust on Us.... that gives Us the motivation to work hard. Thank you. Stay well

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Abnormal Tooth Color,Dental Calculus,Dental Fillings,Dental Cavities,Sensitive Teeth,
review: I had a pleasant experience with Dr. Rituparna and her staff. This was my first experience with her for calculus cleanup and routine checkup. During the checkup she discovered few cavities which got me bit anxious as I was completely unaware of them. But, due to her professionalism and friendly nature she was able to explain the issue to me really well which helped me remain calm. At the end, she provided good advise as well. Happy with the experience, my teeth feel brighter, stronger and safer.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I visited for Scaling / Polishing
Dr. Saha was very attentive and suggested possible remedies for my concerns. She took the effort to explain the pros and cons in detail. She performed the procedure with care and did not rush. I would definitely visit her in the near future for future procedures. Overall, I am satisfied and would definitely recommend her.
reply_text: Thank you for valued appriciation. Wish to treat you in future.

tags: None
review: Excellent chamber with all modern gadgets and precautions, when I visited Dr. was very friendly and gentle.I told her about my suffering she heard it with patience and examined me afterwards taking quite a bit of time. Then she explained to me the actual problems for which I was suffering, it was the wisdom tooth creating problems and it has to be removed. She told me details how she will do it, the time she will take and also she told me the cost.I was surprised to note that her cost was very reasonable compared to other doctors I have visited earlier. I agreed and she removed the tooth and I almost didn't felt any pain as such. Afterwards I vae visited her many times with my family and every time we were fully satisfied. I highly recommend her
reply_text: Thank you for your valued feedback... it was a  pleasure having you , you were a very cooperative patient.
